name: Archipelago - A real pirate game [Title WIP] HubbGrupp 5
name_original: Archipelago - A real pirate game [Title WIP] HubbGrupp 5
description:
For some reason there's a bug that causes the camera to be very zoomed in at the boat at the start of the hub which is really annoying..

There is a game at the bottom left and another a little bit to the right slightly above the boat where it spawns. If you play the bottom one first you can exit it later on and the camera is fixed :P

Enjoy :D
